episodes.title: Episode 299- Soggy Bonnie - Shuli Egar and Bonnie McFarlane
episodes.summary: Shuli Egar and Bonnie McFarlane sit down with Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J. Gomez, and Dave Smith to talk about getting kicked off the radio, The Oscars, and most importantly, judging The Battle Of The Bad Ass Bands 2! We also discuss feminist comic Jamie Kilstein losing his radio show for alleged sexual misconduct. The Skanks analyze The Oscars fuck up between Moonlight and La La Land. The Battle Of The Bad Ass Bands gets heated up. The first 8 bands move on to the next round, and Luis booked a very special surprise guest. All this and more, only on the most offensive podcast on Earth, the Legion Of Skanks!!!

episodes.title: Episode 298- Swastika Jesus - Anthony Cumia
episodes.summary: Anthony Cumia joins Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J Gomez, and Dave Smith on this week's episode! Luis taught Big Jay a better way to wipe, so he has less time on the toilet to prepare for the show. The Skanks come up with white versions of black movies, watch a video of a monkey prostitute, and learn the secret origin behind the Nike Air Jordan logo. Luis calls a list of numbers in Patterson New Jersey that could get him closer to his father's killer. Finally, Cumia closes out the show by joining the Skanks in a karaoke version of Gangster's Paradise. Stay tuned next week for Round 1 of Battle Of The Bad Ass Bands! All This and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth, Legion of Skanks!!!​

episodes.title: Episode 297- Eighty Four Percent - Mark Normand, Nick Mullen, and Mickey Gall
episodes.summary: Mark Normand, Nick Mullen, and Mickey Gall sit down with Luis J. Gomez and Dave Smith. Luis digs up information on his father's murder, and wants to have the man sentenced in the Patterson Knifing on the show. Nick Mullen shares how he got banned from Twitter, and Luis challenges Mickey Gall's sister to a second round in the LOS octagon. A special guest homeless man high on cocaine stops in to freestyle in the middle of the show. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth, Legion of Skanks!!!

episodes.title: Episode 296- Five Eighths Of A Person - Kareem Green and Dustin Chafin
episodes.summary:
Kareem Green and Dustin Chafin sit down with Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J Gomez, and Dave Smith. The Skanks try but fail at freestyle rapping, Big Jay and Luis try to clear up their skin with charcoal mask facials, and we watch the trailer for the Lifetime Original movie about Duke pornstar Belle Knox. Big Jay points out that Hulk Hogan and Donald Trump both want to bang their daughter’s, and that you can solve almost any problem with a coat hanger. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth, Legion of Skanks!!!

The latest 10 episodes are always free, but if you want access to all the archives, watch live, chat live, access to the forums, and get the show a week before it comes out everywhere else - you can subscribe now at GaSDigitalnetwork.com and use the code LOS to save 15% on the entire network, plus get a discount code on all merchandise!

The Battle of the Bad Ass Bands is back for it's second year! We will be taking submissions now until February 17th. This contest is open to all musical genres and open to both bands and solo artists.
 
What we need from you to enter:
 
- Email legionofskanks@gmail.com with the subject 'Battle of the Bad Ass Bands'. 
  - Include Full Band Bio, Band logo/image, 4 original songs.
  - Songs should be mp3 attachments or on onedrive or google drive
  - You have to be IN the band or REPRESENT the band. Meaning you can't submit a             band you're just a fan of. 
 
Winner gets $500 this year! We will announce the top 32 on the show on Weds Feb 22nd! Again, the deadline for submissions is February 17th and make sure your subject line says 'Battle of the Bad Ass Bands' to legionofskanks@gmail.com! Good luck!

episodes.title: Episode 295- Extra Improv Bone - Yamaneika Saunders and Justin Silver
episodes.summary:
Yamaneika Saunders joins Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J Gomez, and Dave Smith live in the hive at the Creek and the Cave! On this week's episode we kick off Black History Month with LOS! Yamaneika explains her abstinence vow for the next two years, helps the guys list the top 10 Blacks of All Time, and the Battle of the Bad Ass Bands is back! We're accepting submissions until Feb 17th 2017! Email legionofskanks@gmail.com with the subject line 'Battle of the Bad Ass Bands'! All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!

The latest 10 episodes are always free, but if you want access to all the archives, watch live, chat live, access to the forums, and get the show a week before it comes out everywhere else - you can subscribe now at GaSDigitalnetwork.com and use the code LOS to save 15% on the entire network, plus get a discount code on all merchandise!

episodes.title: Episode 294- Tape'em To The Wall - Duncan Trussell
episodes.summary: Duncan Trussell joins Big Jay Oakerson, Dave Smith, and Luis J Gomez for the first time on this week's episode. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!​

episodes.title: Episode 293- Blop Blop - Zac Amico
episodes.summary: Zac Amico joins Big Jay Oakerson, Dave Smith, and Luis J Gomez on this week's episode. This one was actually pre-recorded in Dec. at The GaS Digital Studio. Zac Amico and The Skanks discuss public sex and the time Luis had sex in Central Park. Zac Amico and Jay are horror movie fanatics so they discuss some of the latest horror films they've watched and their favorite classic horror movies. Zac Amico's father chased him around with an axe to celebrate The Shining. Luis tells a tale of performed magic as a child, which we've never heard before and the birth of Luis' "Su-Fi" Blop-Blop!! All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!​

episodes.title: Episode 292- Speckled Puss - Ari Shaffir and Calise Hawkins
episodes.summary: Ari Shaffir and Calise Hawkins join Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J Gomez, and Dave Smith at The Gas Digital Studio. This is a pre-recorded episode so don't be alarmed when they start off discussing Christmas. Don't worry, they remember that Calise Hawkins, a very attractive comedian, is in studio and quickly change the topic to discuss sexual consent when one or both people have been drinking. Also Calise's bout with vitiligo, Ari Shaffir and Luis make a bet, and the Skanks try to figure out if Dave is a Gay Ass Niii... you know what, you'll just have to listen to the episode to find out what they call Dave. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!

episodes.title: Episode 291- Bloods and Cripples - Anthony Cumia, Nick Mullen, and Stavros Halkias
episodes.summary: Big Jay Oakerson is out of town, so Luis J Gomez and Dave Smith sit down with Anthony Cumia, Stavros Halkias, and Nick Mullen. They talk about The Apprentice, donating testicles, and getting molested by the dentist. Luis asks Anthony to weigh in on another fight on social media, this time with Build-A-Bear Workshop. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!​

episodes.title: Episode 290- Lincoln Logs - Greg Stone
episodes.summary:
Big Jay Oakerson, Dave Smith, and Luis J Gomez sit down with fellow comedian, Greg Stone to talk about jerk towels, sales 101, and African sex rituals. Luis teaches us how to win friends and influence people, and hopes to start 2017 fighting in women's MMA. All this and more on the most offensive podcast on Earth... THE LEGION OF SKANKS!!!
